name: Valor (itch) (LumixInteractive)
description:
ValorFPS is a free to play multiplayer first-person shooter developed by me! I am only one person so updates may be spaced out in releases, but they will be released. 

During the Alpha stages of this game, graphical or gameplay bugs may occur. Along with this, you may find yourself experiencing bad performance or connection issues, please report it and we will work on a solution. Please keep in mind that I am a solo developer, and I am not that good at developing yet, over time, you will see many changes impacting this game.
